Articles.Content:
So I was building an interplanetary ship to go to Duna, when things scaled up a bit... And then this happened.

What should I do?

Edited March 18, 2014 by KNSA Scientist
Upload the image to a image sharing website (like Imgur) and the copy and paste the code to your forum post (it tells you which one to use).

Go to http://imgur.com/ hover over the Upload Image section and click the computer. Search for the file then click it and press "Open" When the image pops up on the Imuger website copy down the URL of the website. Then when your posting something press the icon of the tree and enter in the URL

So I was building an interplanetary ship to go to Duna, when things scaled up a bit... And then this happened.

EDIT: Alright I can't even upload images, help would be nice.

Make sure it is not just http://imgur.com/xeZjTxw. it needs to be in the format : http://i.imgur.com/xeZjTxw.jpg . Notice the .jpg on the end. you need to include an extension

I am not sure how to escape the image tag but I will give it a try: ""
Too much delta V? Is there such a thing?
You have enough Delta-V for a round trip twice over, or a round trip to one of the lower gravity moons of Jool, or a one-way trip to Moho.
